episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1101_0:
The Festival of Champions took over Pasio as
fans celebrated the gathering of Champions from
all over the world.

At the event arena, many people were enjoying
the chance to meet and greet the Champions.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_0:
I suppose we should have expected this, given
all the star power gathered in one place!
Now, where is our Unova Champion?

Tee-hee! Check out these frills! Aren’t
they amazing?

Hydreigon and I are gonna make this event so
much fun for everyone here!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_1:
Indeed! Hydreigon is looking very tough! And that
outfit looks great on you, Iris.

Remember, today you’ll have to be on your best
behavior, as you’re representing all of Unova.
All right! The fans are here!
Miss Cynthia! Can I shake your hand?
Heeey... I’m a Champion, too, y’know!
D-don’t worry too much about that!

You’re the best, b’cause you’re still a kid but
you’re Champion, too!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_2:
Hydreigon’s one of the most brutal Pokémon ever,
right? It’s so cool that you partnered up with one!

Let’s keep the talk coming! Feel free to ask me
any questions!
Oh, that girl... Is that her?
Yeah, I can introduce you. Let’s go!

Nice to make your acquaintance, everyone
from Unova!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_0301_3: It’s such a pleasure to meet you!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_3:
We were just talking, and you came up in our
conversation, Iris!

Diantha was saying that as a fellow Champion,
she wanted to meet you in person!
Really? Wait, she’s a Champion, too?!

You didn’t know? Diantha is the Champion of the
Kalos region.

And she’s more than that. She’s also a
world-famous actress!
I’ve learned a lot from her acting!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_4:
*chuckle* What an honor to hear those words
from Brycen-Man himself!

My! I had no idea you were familiar with
my work!
Let’s have a chat together sometime!
Now, I suppose this is your partner, Hydreigon?
It’s OK. It just shows how excited she is!
I can see you’ve taken good care of her.
Hm? Iris, are you nervous or something?

It’s just...Diantha is so pretty, calm,
and mature...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1101_5:
May I have your attention, please. Exhibition
matches between the Champions will commence
shortly.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4001_1001_5:
Oh, that’s right! I signed up for that! I should
get going!

Iris is still Iris, even when she’s the
Champion, huh?

So that child is the young rising Champion
of Unova...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4002_1001_0:
I wanna be that elegant and cool when I
grow up, too.

Man, I’m kinda bummed out about this exhibition
match now.
I mean, Lance is awesome. But Iris...

I could give her a break for not emanating poise
and grandeur like the other Champions do,
but the gap in experience is too huge.

That difference between them is going to be
painfully obvious on the battlefield.

High-stakes matches like this tend to happen a
lot on Pasio, huh.

Heh. Bet it’s gonna be pretty embarrassing to
be a Trainer from Unova for a while after
Iris’s match.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4002_1001_1: Is he saying...I’d be an embarrassment to Unova?
Well, hopefully it’ll be a good match in any case.

I’m the Champion of Unova... I’ve gotta make
my people proud.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4003_1001_0: Let’s give them a good match.
What’s wrong? We haven’t even started yet...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4004_1001_0:
It appears the trial run was a success...
I can’t wait to see what happens tomorrow.

Cut it out, Hydreigon! What’s gotten into
you today?
I—I don’t know! I don’t know!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4004_1001_1:
Sorry, Iris, but we need to stop Hydreigon
right now before anything else happens.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4004_1001_0: Lance, can you give me a hand?
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4004_1001_1: It looks like I don’t have a choice!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4005_1001_0:
Please be sure this doesn’t happen again at
tomorrow’s matches.

Fortunately, we were able to keep the damage
to a minimum.
Still, I wonder why Hydreigon acted out like that...

Iris, you understand dragons the best of us all.
Maybe you can tell us why?

Please, tell us why Hydreigon went on
that rampage!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4005_1001_1:
I noticed you weren’t your usual self right before
our match.

It was almost as if you were so worked up,
you couldn’t tell what was happening with
your partner.

Iris, you must remember that you’re no ordinary
Pokémon Trainer.

You are a role model to others, and you represent
Unova as Champion.

I hope you can understand that and conduct
yourself accordingly.

Sorry, everyone. Just like Lance said, I have no
idea what’s going on with Hydreigon.

I...I’m gonna think back on today and try to talk to
her to figure out what’s wrong...and I’ll do my
best tomorrow! Bye!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4006_1001_0:
Sorry, Haxorus. Thanks for coming all the way
here with me.
Hydreigon just won’t come out of her Poké Ball.
I bet she hates me now...

Isn’t it a little lonely to be at a place like this, just
the two of you?

You don’t have to bottle up your feelings,
you know.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4006_1001_1: I don’t know the hearts of dragons like you do...

But I might know a little about the hearts
of Champions.
Or perhaps...the hearts of other girls?

I wanted to make sure people knew me...and
accepted me...
I just wanted to make everyone happy.

I wanted them to know that I’m the proud
Champion of Unova...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4006_1001_2:
I see... So you overheard some mean comments
about you before your match. People sure can
say the rudest things.
Do you feel a little better now after talking it out?

You know, when Grandpa Drayden gave me my
Champion outfit...

I remember thinking I’d become a great Champion,
just like Alder was!
But I don’t think I can do it anymore...
I don’t have the experience...and I’m just a kid...

You know, the same thing happens to me with
my acting.

When I compare myself to other actors, I end up
fixating on how different we are, and it’s just not
a nice feeling.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4006_1001_3:
It affects how I feel about acting sometimes...and
I imagine that’s how you’re feeling about yourself
right now.

But...maybe you can try to look for what you have
in common instead!

There’s something within you that other Champions
also have!
A special quality that every Champion shares.

That’s about all the advice I can give you tonight.
The rest, you’ll have to figure out for yourself!

I know you’ll get it. You are a Champion, too,
after all!
An important quality for a Champion to have...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4006_1001_4:
Who knew this would happen while I was taking
my time traveling around Pasio!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1101_0:
Excited crowds returned to the arena as day two
of Pasio’s Festival of Champions kicked off.

But one Trainer didn’t seem quite as eager
as the others...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_0:
Tch! What’s so great about those other
Champions anyway?

You must find a way to shake this off, Iris.
You have a match to win later today.

Sorry, little ones. Iris isn’t feeling very well
right now.

Oh, I know! Why don’t we play pretend? I’ll be
Brycen-Man, and you can all be my minions!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_1: You’re worried about her, aren’t you.

Lance, yesterday may have been a big mess, but
Iris is still an amazing Champion. You’ll see!
Don’t lose hope in her just yet, OK?
Oh? What makes you think I’m losing hope?
I’d say he thinks quite highly of Iris, actually.

So much so that he even went to check on her
last night to see if she was OK.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_0402_2: You should probably ask Diantha that question...
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_2:
It’s fine. The job was probably better left in your
hands anyway.

In any case, it seems I’m not alone in my concern
for Iris. You obviously wanted to help her, too.

I want to be there to witness it—the moment
when Iris discovers who she truly is for the
first time.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_3:
On second thought, let’s worry about that later.
Come on, Cryogonal! We have to stop this!
This looks like what happened yesterday...

Team Break?! Don’t tell me you’re the ones
behind this...

Why, of course we are! All thanks to this
ingenious machine of mine!

It emits a specialized signal that incites the thrill
of battle in its targets!

Pokémon with wild, aggressive natures are
simply unable to resist it!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_4:
Oho! It would be unwise to pick a fight with me
right now, little girl.
This is bad. We need to stop them immediately!

Hold them down then! We can’t let them
put anyone else in danger!
Iris! Send out your Haxorus to stop Hydreigon!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4007_1001_5: Iris, look at your partner! Look into her eyes!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_0: Hurry, Iris! Use Haxorus and calm Hydreigon down!
You’re fighting so hard against yourself.

I bet you were fighting super hard yesterday,
too...but you were frustrated because you couldn’t
control yourself...

Now isn’t the time to call out Haxorus. This is
between you and me, Hydreigon.

Listen—you can fight this! Don’t let that stupid
machine control you!

Give it up! There’s nothing you can say that’ll get
through to your little dragon!
That’s why I HAVE to say this!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_1:
I know her heart! So I’m gonna use my words to
get through to her!

We’re the same! We both hate to lose, and we
fought a lot in the past. But I know how strong
you are!
I know you can do this!

Because I’m Iris, Champion of Unova, and you’re
my partner!
I knew you could do it!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_2:
What?! That Pokémon isn’t responding to my
machine anymore?!

Hydreigon would never let herself be controlled by
your silly little toy!

Uh-oh! Looks like she’s raring to go now, thanks to
that machine!
Let’s use that rage to protect everyone!
Feel free to cut loose, Hydreigon!
Time to beat a hasty retreat...

Wait...the other Pokémon aren’t affected by the
machine, either?
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_7: Yeah! Thanks to Iris bustin’ it up!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_3: You underestimate the power of sync pairs.

Our bonds with our partners are too strong to be
broken by some machine!
Now let’s hear an apology for what you did!

Sounds like we’re back on schedule with the
exhibition matches.

Even though Team Break caused Hydreigon to
lose control, it doesn’t change the fact that I still
wasn’t paying her enough attention.
I’m so sorry for what happened.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_4:
No matter what happens from now on, I’m gonna
make sure my heart is bound to my Pokémon!
I promise to always do that—as Champion!

You have a lot of resolve for someone so young.
If a certain someone had met you when he was
younger, you would’ve run circles around him!

I see now why he said we should just be patient
and watch over you.
Oh, nothing. Let’s continue to aim for higher goals!

How marvelous it is to see someone grow right
before your eyes...

I think I understand now why Champions are the
ones who guide younger Trainers!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_5:
I always worked hard to improve myself as a
Champion and actress, but I never really gave
much thought to helping others improve...

Now, I think that’s something I should have
done more.

It feels like a whole new world has opened up
to me!

It’s never too late. You can start with whoever
needs you most.
So Iris’s next opponent is Diantha.

In terms of the matchup, Iris is at
a disadvantage.

But you never know what might happen in a
Pokémon battle...

Especially for someone in the midst of
tremendous growth.
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_6:
Diantha! I think I figured out what that special
quality is. The one you said all Champions share!
I used to say it a lot, too...

“Be considerate toward your Pokémon, and
give them your whole heart!”
That kind of kindness is something I know I have!

How wonderful! Your light is shining even brighter
than before!

You’ve truly proven yourself, Iris. I feel like I can
put my all into this battle!

Show ’em how strong you are, Champion
of Unova!
episode_event_ch0092_80_iris/4008_1001_7: Thanks so much for all your help, Diantha!

But I’m just getting started! And I’m gonna aim to
be even better than the best!
I’m Iris, the Pokémon League Champion of Unova!
And I’m going to defeat you!
